param.description: Enter your Adbrite sid here

param.name: t_headline_weight
param.label: Title Font Weight
param.description: Title Font Weight. Default is bold.

param.name: t_headline_size
param.label: Title Font Size
param.description: Title Font Size in pt. Please type only a number here, no alphabets. Default is 10.

param.name: t_headline_face
param.label: Title Font Facetype
param.description: Title Font Facetype. Default is Arial.

param.name: t_headline_decoration
param.label: Title Font Decoration
param.description: Title Font Decoration. default is underline

param.name: t_headline_color
param.label: Title Font Color
param.description: Title Font color, in hex, without #. Default is 0000FF

param.name: t_text_weight
param.label: Text Font Weight
param.description: Text Font Weight. Default is normal.

param.name: t_text_size
param.label: Text Font Size
param.description: Text Font Size in pt. Please type only a number here, no alphabets. Default is 10.

param.name: t_text_face
param.label: Text Font Facetype
param.description: Text Font Facetype. Default is Arial.

param.name: t_text_decoration
param.label: Text Font Decoration
param.description: Text Font Decoration. default is none.

param.name: t_text_color
param.label: Text Font Color
param.description: Text Font color, in hex, without #. Default is 000000
